title: Skip Two Turns
description: The next player skips two turns.

title: Discard Same Color
description: You can discard all cards of the same color in one turn. If you have only one card left in your hand, you cannot discard it. The next player must draw 2 cards.

title: Take 15 Cards
description: You must draw 15 cards from the deck.

title: All Players Draw 5
description: All players must draw 5 cards.

title: Discard Same Number
description: You can discard all cards with the same number at once. If you have only one card left in your hand, you cannot discard it. The next player must draw 2 cards.

title: Swap Hands
description: You can swap hands with any player of your choice.

title: Delayed Blast
description: Choose any player who will have to draw 5 cards after their next turn, no matter what they play.

title: Shuffle and Play
description: Shuffle the deck and play one card from your hand.

title: Trade Hands
description: Trade hands with the player next to you.

title: No Special Cards
description: Special cards cannot be played for two rounds

title: Ultimate Uno
description: All players must play with open cards for one round.

title: Mystery Card
description: Reveal a card from the deck; players must follow its action.

title: Random Draw
description: Draw 2 random cards from another player's hand and add them to your own.

title: Double Trouble
description: If you play two cards of the same number in one turn, the next player must draw three cards. If you are unable to play two cards of the same number, the game continues as normal.

title: Skip 2 Players
description: The next two players lose their turns.

title: Swap Hands with Fewest Cards Player
description: Give them your large hand and take their small one.

title: Draw Until Wild Card
description: No stopping until you get a Wild card!

title: Reveal Your Hand
description: Next Player plays with your cards exposed until your next turn.

title: Give Half to Next Player
description: The unlucky next player must take half your hand.

title: Discard One Color, Next Draws 5
description: You clear one color, but the next player pays the price by drawing 5 cards.

title: Change Color, Next Draws 4
description: Change the color, and if the next player doesn’t have it, they must draw 4 cards.

title: Shuffle and Distribute
description: Shuffle all the cards except yours and distribute them.

title: Skip Next 3 Turns
description: Miss three turns in a row.

title: Draw Until Even Card
description: The next player must draw until they get an even-numbered card.

title: Lose Hand and Draw 7
description: The next player loses their entire hand and draws 7 fresh cards.

title: Hand Fusion
description: Combine your hand with the next player’s hand and split the combined cards evenly between both of you. Odd cards go to the next player clockwise.
